title: Installation issue: gtkplus
body:
The merge of PR #12568 broke gtkplus at least for me.  Ever since that merge, I get a build error that configure is looking for `cairo-gobject`.

I've been working with @hartzell on a fix, and I'm going to let him post what appears to be the solution, because he is the one that found it and explained it to me.
